ComicInfo.Title: A Past Gone Mad!
ComicInfo.Summary: A Past Gone Mad!: Dr. Doom teams up with Spider-Man, Vision and the Scarlet Witch to prevent the Dark Rider from stealing their powers.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:43:52. [Issue ID 29656]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
